attributes.description:
The Sportage 2.0 CRDi sits at the top of the popular SUV’s range from KIA. The gorgeous looks have further been enhanced with the addition of LED lighting and stunning 19 inch alloy wheels. The interior is well appointed, with sumptuous leather seats, and an array of safety features for peace of mind. Performance comes courtesy of a 2.0L turbocharged diesel engine, providing 131Kw and a monstrous 400Nm of torque, mated to an ultra smooth 8 speed ZF automatic gearbox, which is enough to blast past slower drivers when overtaking, and at the same time, returning a more than respectable fuel consumption.

Balance of KIA’s 5 year / unlimited mileage warranty.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History At Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many MOTUS Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority!

MOTUS: Live. Love. Drive.

attributes.description:
Visualize the new Renault Triber and play around with the 5-7 seat modes.
The new Triber has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate comfort and convenience. it features cooled storage space in the centre console, best-in-class passenger cabin space, available in a sub-4m car and unmatched space in all rows with slide and recline 2nd row seats. it also features best-in-class boot space of 625 litres (in life mode) and interior storage of up to 31 litres.

The new Renault Triber offers a perfect balance of performance and fuel economy. its new generation hi-tech 1.0-litre 3-cylinder petrol energy engine generates 52kw with 96nm torque. further equipped with modern technology like the dual vvt system that delivers maximum response at all revs, it ensures optimum acceleration. this along with good fuel efficiency and low maintenance cost makes the engine ideal for South Africa.
With robust design, attractive styling and modern interiors, the new Renault Triber is ready to make a statement.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
